title: Cant load in ranked game...
body: thanks to this issue i lost a ranked game, i spent the whole 30 minutes trying to fix the issue with no success. My connection was fine, how to fix this?

replies.body: Turn off your firewall? The error cannot be anymore clear.

I had this same issue this Morning fixed it by using the fix button at start up took about 10 minutes and i was ready to play.. I think i was the leaver in your game Mar3thyu that ended up at the post game lobby
i lost 23 lp to this stupid connection thing.

We're investigating an issue that may be giving a Failed to Connect / Firewall error at the moment - check out[ this thread ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/IOuWqG7B-troubleshooting-connection-issues-4032015) for more information.

someone else on my team had the same problem thankfully we got loss prevented but he was connected in the post game lobby for some reason when the game ended he must've been trying to join or something

Have same problem queue'd up for ranked and this happened.

So over all these stupid connection problems.
